Welcome to TIND Technologies` administration guide¶

Welcome to Invenio’s documentation. This documentation is divided into different parts. We recommend that you get started with First Steps with Invenio and then head over to the Quickstart. Besides the quickstart, there is also a more detailed Tutorial that shows how to create a complete application with Invenio. If you’d rather dive into the internals of Invenio, check out the API documentation. Common patterns are described in the Patterns section.

        • what is this?
        • The user reaches WebSubmit main page.
        • The user can then click on the document type he is interested in.
        • The submission starts, the first page of the web form appears.
        • On the last page of the submission, there should be a button like in the following image which will trigger the end script

Guide for tool.tind.io¶

The guide for use of tools.tind.io. This site will be filled with several nice to have tools for librarians and administrators.
